data.question: What software package was used for calculations in the X-ray crystal structure analysis?
What temperature was the X-ray diffraction data for the green block crystal collected at?
True or False: Hydrogen atoms in the green block crystal structure were refined isotropically.
What was the final R1 value obtained in the full-matrix least-squares refinement?
What type of geometry is referred to by T values of 0 or 1 in the context of the materials described?
True or False: The cyanozinc derivative consists of two infinite networks with a previously unknown topology.
What is the edge length of the equilateral triangle formed by copper centers in the solvated [Cu3(tpt)3](ClO4)3 structure?
True or False: The cubic net in solvated [Cu3(tpt)3](ClO4)3 allows access from any chamber to all of its neighbors.
What is the coordination geometry of the copper atom in the solvated [Cu3(tpt)3](ClO4)3 structure?
True or False: The extremely dark red color of the crystals is common for Cu+ complexes.
What method was used to grow the very dark red, almost black crystals of solvated [Cu3(tpt)3](ClO4)3?
data.answer: Diffusion of a solution of [Cu(CH3CN)4]ClO4 in acetonitrile into a solution of tpt in chloroform/1,1,2,2-tetrachloroethane

data.question: True or False: The structure of solvated [Cu3(tpt)3](ClO4)3 was determined from single-crystal X-ray diffraction data collected at room temperature.
What is the space group of the cubic net with large cavities in solvated [Cu3(tpt)3](ClO4)3?
True or False: The synthesis of (20S)-( + )-camptothecin involves an enzymatic desymmetrization of a malonate.
What is the overall yield of (20S)-( + )-camptothecin from lactone 10?
True or False: The synthesis of (20S)-( + )-camptothecin from lactone 10 is a one-step process.
What is the optical rotation of fully synthetic (20S)-( + )-camptothecin?
True or False: Quinoline 12 underwent carbomethoxylation under catalysis by 5 mol % [Pd(OAc)2(dppp)2].
What is the yield of quinoline 4 after the carbomethoxylation of quinoline 12?
True or False: The synthesis of quinoline 4 involves a step with N-bromosuccinimide (NBS) in CCl4.
